57325-57326 |area_code = 605 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = 46-11220 |blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 1265153 |website = |footnotes = }} Chamberlain is a city in the central part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is the county seat of Brule County, and it is located along the Missouri River, across from Oacoma. It became a city in 1881, and 2,473 people lived there at the 2020 census. ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Chamberlain website Category:County seats in South Dakota Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1881 establishments in Dakota Territory
